text: The Monark 540 is a sailboat. It has four beds and a small kitchen under one of the beds. ==History== The Monark 540 was designed by Pelle Petterson for Monark in 1972. ==References== Category:Keelboats Category:1970s sailboat type designs Category:Sailboat type designs by Swedish designers Category:Sailboat types built in Sweden
title: Monark 540
